member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_SIGSTATE
member.summary: The CRYPT_PROVIDER_SIGSTATE structure is used to communicate between policy providers and Wintrust.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_SIGSTATE.cbStruct
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_SIGSTATE.rhSecondarySigs
member.summary: Pointer to an array of secondary signature handles.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_SIGSTATE.fFirstAttemptMade
member.summary: Specifies whether the first attempt to verify a signature has been made.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_SIGSTATE.fNoMoreSigs
member.summary: Specifies whether there exist further signatures that await verification.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_SIGSTATE.dwCurrentIndex
member.summary: Index of the signature currently being verified.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_SIGSTATE.fSupportMultiSig
member.summary: Specifies whether the policy provider supports multiple signatures.

summary.para: Identifies the portion of the policy provider that supports cryptographic policy. This can be one of the following values:
